channel.title: Guy got phat lured
channel.description:
I felt like posting this since It was fucking funny lol,
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZpY9Hk7UE1U&feature=g-vrec&context=G271d019RVAAAAAAAAAg

item.title: Guy got phat lured
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

Just shut the fuck up about this. Anybody would be pissed the fuck off if someone stole $1000.00 from you. Yes, it sucks but he should have known…

He should’ve know what? When talking to someone you trust, you don’t think to take precautions like that. People who do things like this are basically stealing. Although it’s just a number on a database, the point is effort invested in it. If you spend 2 years earning something, you want to cherish it, but if someone comes up and just tricks you into practically handing it over to him, how would you feel?

What would you do if your friend asked you to make a RSMV with him and then took your gear that took you a year to get? People think they can take on a situation they see in a video with ease, but then end up in one of the videos themselves.

Read full topic

item.title: Guy got phat lured
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:36, topic:431589”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=534267.msg3906706#msg3906706 date=1328309493]

:extremeFacepalm:

i’m proud to say that you’re the most retarded moparscapian i’ve met

because a normal facepalm just wasn’t good enough?
[/quote]

my point was that stealing someone’s phat on rs is stealing ~$1k, which is the equivalent of me tapping into your paypal and taking $1k, or tapping into your bank and taking the money (although you’re probably 12, and so i’d take it from your parents’ bank account(s), so you have 1k less in luxuries that i’m sure you rely on)[/quote]
:fp again: I know what u meant…
It doesn’t make sense anyways since a phat is not a life luxurie.
except if he was that retarded to spend 1k on it

Read full topic

item.title: Guy got phat lured
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:24, topic:431589”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=534267.msg3906513#msg3906513 date=1328293680]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=534267.msg3906451#msg3906451 date=1328287748]

Video was fake. Guy getting lured is named is East and he lures with CLS.
[/quote]And why would he change what he lured with just to make a video?

It’s real and dude has to make that he doesn’t get lured,
cmon it’s a fucking game phat is not a reallife item -.- what are you guys wining about, his reaction was fucking funny
[/quote]Yea it’s a game, but the money in that game is easily relatable to real life money. Maybe he even bought that phat for real life money, you never know. Easily a few hundred or close to a grand stolen from him. I’m sure if someone stole that much from you, you’d be pretty unhappy too.[/quote]
point
